title:
Non-supersymmetric non-tachyonic heterotic vacua with reduced rank in
  various dimensions
authors:
Carlo Angelantonj (UNITO & INFN), Ioannis Florakis (Ioannina
  University), Giorgio Leone (UNITO & INFN), Diego Perugini (UNITO)
abstract:
We construct rigid non-supersymmetric heterotic vacua with reduced rank and
no tachyons in six and four dimensions. These configurations are based on
asymmetric orbifold compactifications which do not admit deformation moduli and
represent, to the best of our knowledge, the first instances of non-tachyonic
non-supersymmetric heterotic vacua with reduced rank.
